name: Flyus
description:
Hi there! Do you still remember me? I'm drycarrot and this if the first game in past 1.8 years. I really enjoyed making this game and I am glad that I've finnaly posted something!

In this game you will find: TWO unique bosses, FOUR unique weapons, many obstacles and much more.

GAMEPLAY & LORE:
You're a pilot of flyus. You were kicked from a space plane because everyone thought you were an imposter (even tho you weren't). So you enjoy flying in the space without a way out. My recomendation is to avoid cometes, sattelites and ufos.
GOOD LUCK!

CONTROLS:

Player (flyus) follows your cursor only in the height and for moving forward you cant control him. Pray not to be killed by BigStar boss and his goffy ahh stars. 🙏🙏🙏

In menu navigate by the arrows (up and down), when switching option (in settings) I highly recomend using left and right arrows.

FAQ:

Q: What is shop?

A: You can buy the default weapon there!

Q: What is this button?


A: It is a UFO. I couldn't draw it good 😭😭😭
